item.title: Jesse add a quote by John Wagner
item.description: "I guess sometimes you just have to fight your battles." -- John Wagner

item.title: Jesse add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Jesse add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Jesse add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "I believe in everything; nothing is sacred. I believe in nothing; everything is sacred. Ha Ha Ho Ho Hee Hee." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Jesse add a quote by David James Duncan
item.description: "We hear nothing so clearly as what comes out of silence. " -- David James Duncan

item.title: Jesse add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "To absent friends, lost loves, old gods, and the season of mists; and may each and every one of us always give the devil his due." -- Neil Gaiman
